message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has immense potential value. While I can't disclose specifics, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a chance to acquire something truly special. Consider this offer carefully, as I have another buyer who is willing to pay the minimum value of $1200000.
